message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $90 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but $90 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $110 is still a bit higher than I'd like to pay. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
I see you're still looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do a bit better than $95, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $105.
I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to pay $98 for the product. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
I'm not willing to go all the way to $98, but I can do a bit better than my last offer. I can offer it to you for $108.
I'm getting close to my budget, but $108 is still a bit too high. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
I'm not willing to go all the way to $100, but I can do a bit better than my last offer. I can offer it to you for $115.

I'm running out of time and I really need this product. I'm willing to meet you at $105, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Please accept this offer, or I'll have to consider buying from someone else.
